Translations.Text: Say O ludia scripture nie transgress limits tvoj nabozenstvo truth nie nasledovat nazor z zaludnit kto ist astray zmylit multitudes ludia; they bol daleko astray na pravo chodnicek
Condemned som those disbelieved Dieta Izrael jazyk David Jesus syn Mary. This they disobeyed transgressed
They nie enjoin jeden iny z committing zly! Chudobny indeed je co they robit
Ona see vela z them allying those disbelieve! Chudobny indeed je co ich hands sent forth ich souls. GOD bol angry them consequently they abide forever retribution
Had they verit v GOD prophet v co revealed him tu they nie befriended them. vela z them bol zly
Ona zalozit ze zly enemies believers bol Zid idol worshipers. Ona zalozit ze koniec ludia friendship believers bol those say My je Christian This je they have knaz monks them they nie bol arrogant
